ppopt.geometry package

Submodules

ppopt.geometry.polytope module

class ppopt.geometry.polytope.Polytope(A: numpy.ndarray, b: numpy.ndarray)

Bases: object

This is a basic convex polytope class in n-dimensions. In future releases this will take the place of explicitly passing around matrix pairs [A, b] and lead to a simplification of the code base.

ppopt.geometry.polytope_operations module

ppopt.geometry.polytope_operations.find_extents(A, b, d, x)
ppopt.geometry.polytope_operations.get_chebyshev_information(region: ppopt.critical_region.CriticalRegion, deterministic_solver='glpk')
ppopt.geometry.polytope_operations.get_vertices(region: ppopt.critical_region.CriticalRegion, deterministic_solver='glpk')

Generated the vertices of a Critical Region

Parameters

  • region – A critical region

  • deterministic_solver – The optimization Solver to use

Returns

A numpy array of the vertices of a critical region with vertices stored in rows
